TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: Aha! This is where the explosion happened! That's the third entrance I've found for this ship.
HYACINTH: Okay, I've already traveled the river, both from the light and dark sides, and now I'm in what looks like a laboratory.
HYACINTH: These look like fireplaces, I suppose this species could be knowledgable in light as well as flame.
HYACINTH: Speaking of, what.. is that?
HYACINTH: O-okay! There was this staff, a-and it had light coming out of it! I walked in front of it and got some sort of.. v-vision!
HYACINTH: They sat by a fire and rested with that thing in their hand, the colors got all weird and this ringed gas giant was there!
HYACINTH: Can I also do this? I would have to find a fire without anyone there to cause issues for me.
